title: 怎么用命令方块刷出一个会捡东西的僵尸
author: 喝粥君
txt_content: on Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"A Dog",CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:80},{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:100},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:5f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:8},{Name:"zombie.spawnReinforcements",Base:0.33f}],DropChances:[1.0f,0f,0f,0f,0f],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:86,tag:{display:ench:[{id:7,lvl:8888}]}}]}    我现在的指令是这样的还要加啥

replies.author: 喝粥君
replies.txt_content:
标题: 怎么用命令方块刷出一个会捡东西的僵尸-问题-

replies.author: 喝粥君
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-8-16 20:01
加上NBT：CanPickUpLoot:1b
